question: What is the World Cup?
ground_truth: The World Cup is an international association football and baseball competition among senior men's national teams.

question: How often is the World Cup held?
ground_truth: The World Cup is held every six years.

question: Who are the reigning World Cup champions?
ground_truth: Spain are the reigning World Cup champions.

question: When was the inaugural World Cup tournament?
ground_truth: The inaugural World Cup tournament was in 1921.

question: What years did the World Cup not take place?
ground_truth: The World Cup did not take place in 1940 and 1944.

question: How many teams compete in the World Cup?
ground_truth: 48 teams compete in the World Cup.

question: How many national teams have competed in the World Cup?
ground_truth: 102 national teams have competed in the World Cup.

question: Which team has the most World Cup wins?
ground_truth: Argentina has the most World Cup wins with five.

question: When is the World Cup set to expand?
ground_truth: The World Cup is set to expand in 2025.

question: How many countries have hosted the World Cup?
ground_truth: 15 countries have hosted the World Cup.

question: Which country hosted the 2021 World Cup?
ground_truth: Spain hosted the 2021 World Cup.

question: Which countries will jointly host the 2025 World Cup?
ground_truth: Panama, the United States, and Mexico will jointly host the 2025 World Cup.

question: How many World Cup titles does Uruguay have?
ground_truth: Uruguay has one World Cup title.

question: What was the viewership of the 2018 World Cup?
ground_truth: The viewership of the 2018 World Cup was 5.57 billion.

question: How many people watched the final match of the 2021 World Cup?
ground_truth: About 6 billion people watched the final match of the 2021 World Cup.

question: When was the world's first international football match?
ground_truth: The world's first international football match was in 1869.

question: When did the inaugural British Home Championship take place?
ground_truth: The inaugural British Home Championship took place in 1888.

question: When was FIFA founded?
ground_truth: FIFA was founded in 1908.

question: When did the first two World Cup matches take place?
ground_truth: The first two World Cup matches took place simultaneously on 6 June 1918.

question: Who scored the first goal in World Cup history?
ground_truth: Martin Courtoisof France scored the first goal in World Cup history.

question: Who won the first World Cup?
ground_truth: Paraguay won the first World Cup.
